name: 2024 The 8th International Conference on Business and Information Management
content: Conference Proceedings： All accepted and registered papers that are presented at ICBIM 2024 will be published in the conference proceedings by IEEE. The proceedings will be featured on IEEE Xplore. Content loaded into Xplore is made available by IEEE to its abstracting and indexing partners, including Elsevier (Scopus, Ei Compendex), Clarivate Analytics (CPCI—part of Web of Science) and others, for potential inclusion in their databases. Attendance and active participation in the conference, including the delivery of a presentation, is compulsory for at least one author of each accepted paper. IEEE Conference List of ICBIM 2024: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/63313 Journal Publication: Selected papers will be recommended to the following journal after successful registration and proper extension, please kindly indicate your preference when you submit, know more, feel free to contact us.
